name: Lepofrenia
description: The game takes place in a depressed area of the megalopolis, filled to the brim with the romance of the Russian suburbs.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo (or equivalent) Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Compatible with DirectX 9 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® 7 or later Processor: Dual Core 3.0+ GHz or higher Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: Compatible with DirectX 9 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 400 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible
